verses.name: Acts 14:1
verses.text: And it came to pass in Iconium, that they went both together into the synagogue of the Jews, and so spake, that a great multitude both of the Jews and also of the Greeks believed.

verses.name: Acts 14:2
verses.text: But the unbelieving Jews stirred up the Gentiles, and made their minds evil affected against the brethren.

verses.name: Acts 14:3
verses.text: Long time therefore abode they speaking boldly in the Lord, which gave testimony unto the word of his grace, and granted signs and wonders to be done by their hands.
